caption_cn: 如果使用member gateway ,而且member gateway 的xxxxx
檢查 Gateway Line 是否被啓用 (Gateway Line Limit 資料存在,而且 Gateway Line Limit IsActive = true)
caption_en: Check if Gateway Line is enabled (Gateway Line Limit data exists,and Gateway Line Limit IsActive = true)

caption_cn: 檢核 Gateway Line Payment Method 是否被啓用(GatewayLineLimit 的 IsActive)
caption_en: Check whether the Gateway Line Payment Method is enabled (IsActive of GatewayLineLimit)

caption_cn: 濾掉 Suggested Amount 沒有匹配支付金額 的 GatewayLine
caption_en: Filter out GatewayLine whose Suggested Amount does not match the payment amount

caption_cn: 濾掉單筆上下限額沒有匹配的金額
caption_en: Filter out amounts that do not match the upper and lower limits of a single transaction

caption_cn: 濾掉超過單日次數上限的 Gateway Line
caption_en: Filter out Gateway Lines that exceed the daily limit

caption_cn: 濾掉超過單日金額上限(當日FI 交易Merchant 總和超過 PG Quota Limit Per / Day)的 Gateway Line
caption_en: Filter out Gateway Lines that exceed the single-day amount limit (the sum of FI transactions Merchant on the day exceeds PG Quota Limit Per / Day)

caption_cn: 濾掉 超過每分鐘 N 次交易的 GatewayLine
caption_en: Filter out GatewayLine with more than N frequency transactions per minute

caption_cn: 檢核 Gateway Line 當日水位是否存在,不存在的會被濾掉
caption_en: Check balance of the Gateway Line exists on that day. If it does not exist,it will be filtered out.

caption_cn: 此步驟有放入檢核,但實際已經不會濾掉任何線
caption_en: This step has been checked,but it will not actually filter out any lines.

caption_cn: 過濾當日水位大於 Exposure Limit的Gateway Line
caption_en: Filter the Gateway Line whose water level is greater than Exposure Limit on that day

caption_cn: 過濾不支持小數點的 Gateway Line
caption_en: Filter Gateway Lines that do not support decimal points

caption_cn: 過濾掉Processing Balance + Available Balance ≥ Panic Amount 的 Gateway Line
caption_en: Filter out the Gateway Line with Processing Balance + Available Balance ≥ Panic Amount

caption_cn: 過濾掉不支持銀行的 Gateway Line
caption_en: Filter out Gateway Lines that do not support banks

caption_cn: 若有 Maintain 的 Gateway Line 則要把新的 Gateway Line 取代原有的 Gateway Line
caption_en: If there is a Maintain Gateway Line,the new Gateway Line must replace the original Gateway Line.

caption_cn: 可在 Gateway Line Balance 篩選區域中發現 Temp Stop FI
caption_en: Temp Stop FI can be found in the Gateway Line Balance filter area

caption_cn: User 在 Gateway > Gateway Line Configuration 編輯內頁中，設定的資訊
caption_en: The information set by User in the editing page of Gateway > Gateway Line Configuration

caption_cn: 當 Order Amount > AvailableBalance 時，通道將會被篩選掉
caption_en: When Order Amount > AvailableBalance,channels will be filtered out
